content: elevate your home decor with the intricate moroccan basket crochet pattern this intermediate-level project features unique colorwork to create a stunning 8 diameter x 7 tall basket the pattern includes written instructions video tutorials and is worked in the round from the bottom up using super bulky yarn this basket is as durable as it is beautiful **unique features-** detailed video tutorials for visual learners colorwork adds visual interest sturdy super bulky yarn and double walled for durability **materials needed-** hook 6 5mm us size 10 5 yarn **lion brand heartland thick & quick** http //lionbrand sjv io/xmjgag super bulky weight 350 yards
